title: How to Play Bloody Murder

steps.headline: Figure out who is "it" and sit in a circle.
steps.description: Everyone should put his or her foot in.

steps.headline: Have the "King Caller" (you'll need to decide who the King Caller is too) say a random phrase.
As the person who is "it" lands on someone, he or she says a number and then counts to it.
The one who is "it" hides.
steps.description: Then everyone counts "1 o'clock, 2 o'clock, 3 o'clock rock, 4 o'clock, 5 o'clock, 6 o'clock rock, 7 o'clock, 8 o'clock, 9 o'clock rock, 10 o'clock, 11 o'clock, 12 o'clock, LUNCHTIME! 1 o'clock, 2 o'clock, 3 o'clock rock, 4 o'clock, 5 o'clock, 6  o'clock rock, 7 o'clock, 8 o'clock, 9 o'clock rock, 10 o'clock 11 o'clock, 12 o clock MIDNIGHT!"

steps.headline: Everyone looks for the person who is "it."
steps.description: Then, when someone sees him or her, the person who is "it" can't move and the person who is not "it" can't move until the person who is not "it" yells "BLOODY MURDER!"

steps.headline: Make sure everyone runs to the designated "base"; they can make a chain if they'd like to.
steps.description: If you touch base,  you can come off of it.

steps.headline: If everyone makes it, the person who was "it" is "it" again.
steps.description: If multiple people are tagged, the first person tagged is "it." If one person is tagged, then he or she is "it."

text: Figure out who is "it" and sit in a circle. Everyone should put his or her foot in. Have the "King Caller" (you'll need to decide who the King Caller is too) say a random phrase.  As the person who is "it" lands on someone, he or she says a number and then counts to it. Whoever it lands on is "it." The one who is "it" hides. Then everyone counts "1 o'clock, 2 o'clock, 3 o'clock rock, 4 o'clock, 5 o'clock, 6 o'clock rock, 7 o'clock, 8 o'clock, 9 o'clock rock, 10 o'clock, 11 o'clock, 12 o'clock, LUNCHTIME! 1 o'clock, 2 o'clock, 3 o'clock rock, 4 o'clock, 5 o'clock, 6  o'clock rock, 7 o'clock, 8 o'clock, 9 o'clock rock, 10 o'clock 11 o'clock, 12 o clock MIDNIGHT!" Everyone looks for the person who is "it." Then, when someone sees him or her, the person who is "it" can't move and the person who is not "it" can't move until the person who is not "it" yells "BLOODY MURDER!" Make sure everyone runs to the designated "base"; they can make a chain if they'd like to. If you touch base,  you can come off of it. If everyone makes it, the person who was "it" is "it" again. If multiple people are tagged, the first person tagged is "it." If one person is tagged, then he or she is "it."
